analysis_type: Sequence-level biological analysis for deep-sea eDNA

sequence_findings.finding: Could not sample SSU_eukaryote_rRNA - may need blastdbcmd tool
sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: Tool limitation prevents direct sequence analysis
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Database exists but content analysis requires BLAST+ tools
ITS database present but requires sequence-level access

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: Target: All eukaryotes (protists, metazoans, fungi); Success rate: 60-80% of deep-sea eDNA sequences
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Rationale: 18S rRNA - universal eukaryotic marker; Cost: LOW

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: Target: Higher-level taxonomy, phylogenetic placement; Success rate: 40-60% additional assignments
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Rationale: 28S rRNA - complementary phylogenetic information; Cost: LOW

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: Target: Fungi and some protists; Success rate: 10-30% of sequences (high confidence)
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Rationale: Species-level identification when possible; Cost: LOW

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: Target: Any eukaryotic sequences; Success rate: 5-15% additional assignments
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Rationale: Backup for unassigned sequences; Cost: VERY HIGH

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: EXPECT 20-40% unassigned sequences due to novel deep-sea taxa
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Essential for accurate deep-sea biodiversity assessment

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: IMPLEMENT phylogenetic placement for sequences <80% identity
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Essential for accurate deep-sea biodiversity assessment

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: FOCUS on protist diversity (highest abundance in deep-sea samples)
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Essential for accurate deep-sea biodiversity assessment

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: VALIDATE cnidarian and metazoan IDs (high false positive risk)
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Essential for accurate deep-sea biodiversity assessment

sequence_findings.taxonomic_evidence: CLUSTER unassigned sequences to identify potential new lineages
sequence_findings.biological_significance: Essential for accurate deep-sea biodiversity assessment
